item.title: Component Subscription
item.description: The ComponentSubscription API produces component descriptors for a specific component version. Example # The following is an example of a ComponentSubscription: apiVersion: delivery.ocm.software/v1alpha1 kind: ComponentSubscription metadata: name: podinfo namespace: default spec: interval: 10m0s component: phoban.io/podinfo semver: ">=6.3.x" source: url: ghcr.io/phoban01 destination: url: ghcr.io/phoban01/foo secretRef: name: ghcr-credentials In the above example: A ComponentSubscription named podinfo is created, indicated by the .metadata.name field. The replication-controller checks the Source repository every 10m0s, indicated by the .
